content: We've been trying out [Slack](https://slack.com) in the [globaldev](http://globaldev.co.uk) office. It's the best alternative to [Campfire](https://campfirenow.com) I've seen and is free for now (with an invite), but the standard post-beta pricing ($8/user/month) looks steep for our team of ~50 compared to our unlimited $99/month with Campfire.
